verses.verse: In that <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with his <S%H7186>sore<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H3882>leviathan<s%> the <S%H1281>piercing<s%> <S%H5175>serpent<s%>, even <S%H3882>leviathan<s%> that <S%H6129>crooked<s%> <S%H5175>serpent<s%>; and he shall <S%H2026>slay<s%> the <S%H8577>dragon<s%> that is in the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.
In that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6031>sing<s%> ye unto her, A <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of red <S%H2561%H2531>wine<s%>.

I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> do <S%H5341>keep<s%> it; I will <S%H8248>water<s%> it every <S%H7281>moment<s%>: lest any <S%H6485>hurt<s%> it, I will <S%H5341>keep<s%> it <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H3117>day<s%>.

<S%H2534>Fury<s%> is not in me: who would <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H8068>briers<s%> and <S%H7898>thorns<s%> against me in <S%H4421>battle<s%>? I would <S%H6585>go<s%> through them, I would <S%H6702>burn<s%> them <S%H3162>together<s%>.
Or let him take <S%H2388>hold<s%> of my <S%H4581>strength<s%>, that he may <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> with me; and he shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> with me.

He shall cause them that <S%H935>come<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> to take <S%H8327>root<s%>: <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H6692>blossom<s%> and <S%H6524>bud<s%>, and <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> with <S%H8570>fruit<s%>.

¶ Hath he <S%H5221>smitten<s%> him, as he <S%H4347>smote<s%> those that <S%H5221>smote<s%> him? or is he <S%H2026>slain<s%> according to the <S%H2027>slaughter<s%> of them that are <S%H2026>slain<s%> by him?

In <S%H5432>measure<s%>, when it shooteth <S%H7971>forth<s%>, thou wilt <S%H7378>debate<s%> with it: he <S%H1898>stayeth<s%> his <S%H7186>rough<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the east <S%H6921>wind<s%>.

By <S%H2063>this<s%> therefore shall the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> be <S%H3722>purged<s%>; and this is all the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> to take <S%H5493>away<s%> his <S%H2403>sin<s%>; when he <S%H7760>maketh<s%> all the <S%H68>stones<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> as <S%H1615>chalkstones<s%> that are beaten in <S%H5310>sunder<s%>, the <S%H842>groves<s%> and <S%H2553>images<s%> shall not stand <S%H6965>up<s%>.

Yet the <S%H1219>defenced<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H910>desolate<s%>, and the <S%H5116>habitation<s%> <S%H7971>forsaken<s%>, and <S%H5800>left<s%> like a <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>: there shall the <S%H5695>calf<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%>, and there shall he lie <S%H7257>down<s%>, and <S%H3615>consume<s%> the <S%H5585>branches<s%> thereof.

When the <S%H7105>boughs<s%> thereof are <S%H3001>withered<s%>, they shall be broken <S%H7665>off<s%>: the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H935>come<s%>, and set them on <S%H215>fire<s%>: for it is a <S%H5971>people<s%> of no <S%H998>understanding<s%>: therefore he that <S%H6213>made<s%> them will not have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on them, and he that <S%H3335>formed<s%> them will shew them no <S%H2603>favour<s%>.

¶ And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall beat <S%H2251>off<s%> from the <S%H7641>channel<s%> of the <S%H5104>river<s%> unto the <S%H5158>stream<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and ye shall be <S%H3950>gathered<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> by <S%H259>one<s%>, O ye <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> shall be <S%H8628>blown<s%>, and they shall <S%H935>come<s%> which were ready to <S%H6>perish<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, and the <S%H5080>outcasts<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and shall <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
